H0.text: Taking its name from the Portuguese words for wine and garlic, which hot curry originated in Goa. Vindaloo

H1.text: Taking its name from the Portuguese words for wine and garlic, which hot curry originated in Goa. Xacuti

H2.text: Taking its name from the Portuguese words for wine and garlic, which hot curry originated in Goa. Cafreal

H3.text: Taking its name from the Portuguese words for wine and garlic, which hot curry originated in Goa. Tindaloo

A4.text: Vindaloo's name derives from the quite different Portuguese Goan dish carne de vinha d'alhos (meat with garlic vinegar).
